title: Selecting the Right Technology for the Future
summary: In this case study, see how I used a consultant mindset to lead a client team through migrating an existing application from KnockoutJS to Vue 3 + Typescript.

children.value: "Different pieces of technology kind of go in cycles they have their springs and summers and autumns and then theyâ€¦go to the graveyard of technology and so we try to pick things that are in their springs and if you choose wisely you can save yourself an enormous amount of work...and you can really put energy into making those new emerging technologies great on your platform."

Inspired by one of my favorite quotes from Steve Jobs, I talk about how I led a client team through an iterative migration of a production application. The process I took when leading the move from the older framework of KnockoutJS to the increasingly popular framework Vue.js with TypeScript is explained in this case study.
